Dialogue.Page: Okay, uh-<Pause=2> hello Arial..<Pause=2> or whoever is listening.
This is the expedition log storage of Geoquester, serving under Arial.

During a routine mining job assigned by Times New, Team Fourty-Seven found..<Pause=1> an unidentified object at the core of the Source. The ground surrounding the team and their Drill switched states, and they all fell in.
It shouldn't have switched, the entire security team was watching.<Pause=4> Oh right, logs.
They all vanished on contact with the object, or as Times New started calling it, the Zero.
Esperhand and the rest of the smarty-fucks hypothesised that it was a "two-way gate through space",<Pause=2> whatever the fuck that means.
My job is to go through this "gate",<Pause=1> and try to find Team Fourty-Seven.
Heavens below, its..<Pause=1> shimmery. Shiny things are nice, right? I hope so.
